citances.sentence: The matter of the Perth Agreement investigation was later resolved by consent order of The Federal Court of Australia on the application of the ACCC in September 2006, by which Barton Mines Corporation and Barton International were declared to have engaged in conduct contrary to the Trade Practices Act 1974 and pecuniary penalties were imposed: see Australian Competition and Consumer Commission v Barton Mines Corporation & Ors [2006] FCA 1264.

legistitles.title: TRADE PRACTICES ACT 1974
TRADE PRACTICES ACT 1974 No. 51, 1974 - SECT 45 Contracts, arrangements or understandings in restraint of trade or commerce.
TRADE PRACTICES ACT 1974 No. 51, 1974 - SECT 50 Mergers.
TRADE PRACTICES ACT 1974 No. 51, 1974 - SECT 76 Pecuniary penalties.
